replies: Report the scam to the platform immediately.
Block and avoid any further contact with the scammer.
Change your passwords if you shared any information.
Check recent activity and remove unknown devices.
Use backup codes or linked email/phone to recover.
Contact the support team of the platform.
Use a dark web scan tool to check if your data is compromised.
Change passwords and enable 2FA for all accounts.
Consider monitoring services if sensitive info is leaked.
Visit the official platform settings to delete your account.
Revoke third-party access from other apps linked to it.
